content: wedding gnomes thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size total height is about 10 tall each gnome is about 4 x 4 big materials worsted weight #4 yarn in scissors black 150 yds white 150 pipe cleaners yds tan 20 yds fiber fill silver/grey 5 yds weighted beads glass beads 3 5mm hook beans floral rocks etc needle gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch single_crochet -single flo -front loop skip -skip crochet only st -stitch increase -increase half_double_crochet -half double chain -chain decrease -decrease crochet blo -back loop double_crochet -double only crochet designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items pattern notes easily swap the number of gnomes around to make 2 brides or 2 grooms this pattern is worked in both continuous and joined rounds please note the instruction at the beginning of each part ds 3 single_crochet means one single_crochet in each stitch for 3 stitches 3 single_crochet in same st means three single_crochet in the same stitch hat worked in continuous rounds make one in black and one in white round 1 in magic_ring 6 single_crochet 6 2-26 25 rounds single_crochet in each st 6 27 increase 5 single_crochet 7 28 increase 6 single_crochet 8 29 increase 7 single_crochet 9 30 *2 single_crochet increase* 3 times 12 31 single_crochet in each st 12 32 *3 single_crochet increase* 3 times 15 33 single_crochet in each st 15 34 *4 single_crochet increase* 3 times 18 35 single_crochet in each st 18 36 *5 single_crochet increase* 3 times 21 37 single_crochet in each st 21 38 *6 single_crochet increase* 3 times 24 39 single_crochet in each st 24 40 *7 single_crochet increase* 3 times 27 41 single_crochet in each st 27 42 *8 single_crochet increase* 3 times 30 43 in flo single_crochet in each st 30 44 *9 single_crochet increase* 3 times 33 45 single_crochet in each st fasten_off weave in tail 33 designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items groom body worked in joining rounds round 1 attach with black to any of the exposed back loops from black hat round 43 *4 single_crochet increase* 2 times switch to white 4 single_crochet increase switch to black *4 single_crochet increase* 3 times slip_stitch to join chain 1 36 2 with black 4 single_crochet in blo 4 single_crochet 4 single_crochet switch to white single_crochet in blo 4 single_crochet single_crochet switch to black 4 single_crochet in blo 4 single_crochet 10 single_crochet slip_stitch to join chain 1 36 3 with black 12 single_crochet switch to white 6 single_crochet switch to black 18 single_crochet slip_stitch to join chain 1 36 4 with black 12 single_crochet switch to white 2 single_crochet in blo 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet switch to black 18 single_crochet slip_stitch to join
